description: The male leading character of the story. He is a 2nd high-school grader. He is always hanging around with his childhood friend Nanami, spending their time going to school together and working at her families vegetable field on the outskirts of town. He owns a vintage motorcycle model Triumph, passed down to him by his father. He has wanted that motorcycle ever since he was a child, and his father finally decided to give it to him, although it is always breaking parts.
name: Tomosaka Kenji
